1370: Mauricius was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Liedelde at age 25 in 1370.
1373: Had a son with Liedelde, Wigboldo, at age 28.
1374: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Sara, at age 29.
1375: Had a son with Liedelde, Gerart, at age 30.
Lost daughter Sara when Sara was 2 years old.
1380: Had a son with Liedelde, Segher, at age 35.
Lost son Gerart when Gerart was 6 years old.
1384: Lost son Galo when Galo was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Liedelde gave birth to their stillborn son Galo in 1384.
1386: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Saswe, at age 41.
